long_description: The sleek and formfitting STM Harbour case armors your iPhone(R) 5 in an outer hard shell and inner soft surface that offer durability and protection. Case preserves access to all your phone's ports, buttons, controls and camera lenses. Outer hard shell is made of tough polycarbonate; inner soft surface is made of thermoplastic urethane. The STM Harbour case features a hinged bottom that makes it a snap to remove or dock your iPhone 5.
short_description: The sleek and formfitting STM Harbour case armors your iPhone(R) 5 in an outer hard shell and inner soft surface that offer durability and protection.
